column1: short and wide to start the proceedings. Angling away from Worker and nice carry through to Hope
slightly better line but still short outside off, frees his arms to cut this past point
crisply punched off the back foot to cover, back of a length just outside off stump and smacked off the back foot
full outside off and swing in the air. Angling away from the left hander as it's driven on the up to cover
short on middle and angling down leg side, tries to pull but takes his glove through to the diving keeper
back of a length outside off but a mistimed punch off the back foot to mid on. Good start from Cottrell
good length on off stump, settles onto his back foot and cuts but it's not off the sweet spot of the bat. Goes to point
fuller ball on off stump, rolls his fingers over the ball this time, defended off the front foot with soft hands
slightly full on leg stump, clipped off his hips past midwicket for a quick double. That should get the blood flowing
short but not much pace on that delivery, attempts to glance off his hips towards the leg side, but brushes his pads instead as it trickles down to fine leg
full outside leg and going down leg side. Worker attempts to flick off his pads but misses
good length on middle stump and Worker pounces onto this in a flash. Pulled over square leg's head and off it goes
fuller ball on leg stump and Worker's through his tap-shot too early. Lobs towards the leg side but falls just short of midwicket
short just outside off stump, tiptoes and cuts off the back foot but the ball's too close to his body
short outside off and extra bounce takes it over the batsman's blade, as he attempts to cut at it wildly

back of a length on off stump, tucks into the batsman's body as he pushes towards midwicket. Quick call for the single, and they do well to get through. Worker's bat got stuck in the grass as he tries to drag the bat in

dropped by the keeper! That extra bounce troubles Worker again. This time's its outside off but angling into his body, takes Worker's gloves as Shai Hope dives to his left, but the ball wobbles off his gloves and onto the ground. Lucky escape

through his legs this time! Full on leg stump and as the batsman tries to flick this off his toes, he misses completely. Flies through between both legs and the keeper collects. Appeal for caught-behind but the umpire isn't interested
full on middle and angling into the pads, easily lifted over wide mid on's head to end the over with a boundary
good length on off stump and through to the keeper as the batsman gets his bat out of the way. Operating on a nice channel outside off, Holder
decks it short this time and Worker is quick to swivel and pull along the carpet, but there's a man at deep midwicket now

ridiculous! Slog swept over deep midwicket! Full on off stump and he's swift to get down on one knee. Slightly foxed by the slower ball but his bat speed is so high that he drags this over the boundary ropes.
full on middle and slower ball this time, through his punch too early and lobs in the air. Just past the outstretched hands of Holder
full on off and angling away from his body, cut to point but misfield. Allows them to take the run
full outside off, pokes at it with very gentle hands and they scamper through for the run
short just outside off, and into the batsman's body, opens his bat's face and sends it down to third man. Played it from almost near his face
surprises him with the bounce! Decked short just outside off and gets big onto him. Tried to cut but too close to his body, hits his glove on the full. Ouch. Time for the physio to have a look
low full toss on off stump, seemed like the ball slipped off his hand. Punched back to the bowler. Reprieve for the bowler

whipped off his pads and it clears the big leg-side boundary! That blow on the finger don't seem painful at all! Full on off stump and quick to use his wrists and flicked over deep backward square. Oooh, off the bat's sweet spot
not timed as well this time but more runs, full on middle and off, and he smacks this over mid on's head but the ball does not have the legs to go for four, retrieved by the fielder after a chase
goes short again to end the over, good length on off stump and it's tapped off the back foot towards point for a quick run
short outside off and furiously pulled to deep midwicket. There's a man in the deep for that shot
slower, short ball on leg stump, mistimed pull to deep backward square
good length on off stump and angling away from Worker, cut along the carpet past the diving point fielder. Third man does very well to cut it off
full on leg stump and he misses the flick off his toes. Smacks his pads and they appeal for the lbw. Not out says the umpire, but Holder is considering a review. May have pitched outside leg
slower ball short outside off, bunts his cut past point for more runs
full on off stump, mistimed slog past the fielder at midwicket for a single
short outside off and well positioned to cut square but straight to point. Well timed
back of a length on middle stump, quick to get inside the line of the ball and flicked off his hips to deep backward square
short on middle and extra bounce this time, pulled with his front foot in the air to open the leg side further behind square. Once again played to deep backward
firmly defended off the front foot but importantly with slow hands, quick run for a single and that's the fifty partnership
short outside off and this time the pull costs Munro his wicket. Cottrell salutes as the ball goes into mid on's hands. Got slightly big on Munro and he top edges his pull shot
nice channel outside off as the batsman shoulders his arms. Good length just outside off
good length on leg stump, defended off the back foot towards the leg side
full on off stump and his defense takes the inside edge, lucky it didn't hit leg stump on it's way, they scamper through for the single however
full on off stump, driven off the front foot but with the open face of the bat, goes towards cover point
full on off stump, driven back past the bowler to mid off
on a good length on middle stump, attempts to work this off his pads towards the leg side but not great contact off the bat
good length wide outside off, driven off the front foot slightly away from his body, trickles away to cover
short just outside off and extra bounce on offer once again. The batsman's quick to drop his knee and get under the rising delivery
god length on middle, slightly slower this time, drops his hands as the ball is tapped towards short midwicket. Allows them to take the run
full on middle stump, off-balanced as he tries to whip this off his toes. Straight to midwicket
top edge but the breeze takes the ball over fine leg's head! Lucky for Broom. A good bouncer that he attempts to pull with closed eyes. Flies off the edge and into the stands
another beautiful delivery, short on off and angling across his body. Broom is forced to get onto his toes as the ball takes his bat's shoulder, but falls short of gully. Living dangerously, Broom
an exquisite delivery to end the over! Good length on middle and the ball angles across the batsman's blade as he tries to defend off the front food. Millimeters away from his outside edge.
bad line and punished. Full outside leg and gently clipped off his pads fine down the leg side
good length on leg stump, worked off his pads to the fielder manning the square-leg region
good length on off and angling away from the left-hander's body. Shoulders his arms.
full on leg stump and timed perfectly off his pads. Simple flick off his toes and races away square on the leg side. Races past the square-leg umpire's right
full on middle, quick to go onto his back foot and defended
good length on leg stump, goes deep into the crease and taps this towards the leg side
good length on leg stump, tries to defend but takes the leading edge off the bat's shoulder. Falls just short of short cover
short on off stump and the batsman pulls out of his hook shot. Nice channel and bounce outside off
good length on off stump, opens his bat's face and sends this down to third man

straight to first slip's hands! Good length on off stump and he pushes at the ball looking to run this down to third man once again, but takes the outside edge and it's a regulation catch for Holder, who dives forward
short but wayward line, going down leg side
good length on off stump, cuts it from near his body past point. There's a third man, whose kinda square, for that shot
innovative! Short, wide outside off and he reaches at it to cut this uppishly over third man's head. Ridiculous timing as he slaps this behind square
full on leg stump, tapped off his pads to deep midwicket

short on middle and the batsman tries to defend inside the line of the ball, played down the wrong line and takes the outside edge of his bat, short of first slip as Holder dives over the ball. A reprieve
short outside off but angling into Taylor, mistimed drive to cover
good length on off stump but angling into Taylor's pads, shuffles across to the off side and taps this to midwicket for a quick single
full outside leg stump and goes down as another wide. Worker happy to let that go
good length on off stump, bends his knee with the ball staying low as he attempts to cut, but not off the middle. Trickles away to point
back of a length on middle, worked off his hips to square leg
full just outside off, played with soft hands towards the leg side. Slightly in the air, but still far away from midwicket. Strike easily rotated
quick ball (142 kph) on a good length just outside off, blocked off the front foot
back of a length outside off, tries to cut but undercuts the delivery as it goes one-bounce through to Shai Hope. Could've easily played it onto his off stump as well
full on off stump, punched back to Beaton, who does very well to collect the ball on his follow through
overpitched on middle stump, driven to mid on but no sniff of a run. Tight over from Beaton
short and wide outside off, cut to deep point. But Evin Lewis is positioned there for that shot
good length on leg stump, tapped off his hips to midwicket. Minimal footwork
short outside leg stump, pulled fine along the ground to fine leg
short on middle and going down leg side. Taylor wanted to pull it but the extra bounce takes it over his head
good length just outside off, punched square off the front foot but intercepted by point
good length outside off stump, defends off the back foot
full on off stump, flicked off his hips to deep backward square, and he'll keep the strike
full outside off and late tail into the right hander, firmly driven along the ground to mid off

full on leg stump but angling into the left-hander's pads, flicked off his boot in front of square on the leg side. More runs for him, as midwicket gives the ball a chase. Holder the man putting in the hard yards
good length on middle, turned off his hips to deep backward square for another single
good length outside off and cuts this into the ground. Trickles away to Cotterell at third man
full outside off and late inswing into Taylor, defended with soft hands
good length outside off, tapped past point off the back foot. And that's drinks
drifts in from around the stumps, eased to long-on
flatter one on middle and leg, worked behind square leg as they jog the single
drifts in and skids through from around the stumps, defended back
excellent take down leg by the keeper, too much drift. Got the line wrong
pushed through quicker on middle from wide of the crease, turned with the angle to midwicket
skids back in from length on middle, punched to long-on for an easy single
steps out but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, turns this gently to short midwicket
floats this full on middle and leg from around the stumps, clipped off the pad into the gap at deep backward square leg
arches back, gets on top of the bounce and steers this down to third man
crunching cover drive. Too full and Taylor laced that towards the sweeper
cuts but can't pick the gap, straight to point
skiddy bouncer but Taylor does well to keep this pull all along the ground to deep square, rolled his wrists over the ball nicely

top-edges a pull, this flies over fine leg to bring up a half-century for Worker, his third overall and second in a row. The bowler has every reason to believe the world is unfair, because he beat him for pace
driven firmly into the gap at deep point. This full delivery kept drifting away
width on offer, driven to deep point
slider on middle, punched to long-on
pushed through quicker on middle, punched to long-on
nice and full on the stumps, he lunges forward and smothers the spin
works this full delivery down to long-on
slower and fuller on middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
bunts this length ball down to third man, sensible batting
attempts a bouncer but this flies way over the batsman's head, excellent take by the keeper.

terrible, terrible mix-up. Worker had given up halfway through the single, a direct hit at the striker's end from point and it would've been curtains. Taylor just bunted this towards point, Kyle Hope had more time than he realised.
rolls his wrists over the ball to keep this pull down, beats the fine leg fielder. Excellent control over the stroke. Poor effort from Cottrell who tries to pull off a stop with his boot
dabs this away-going length ball to backward point

pulled straight down the throat of the fine leg fielder. This was short, he picked the length early, but this time couldn't keep it down. Rovman Powell was eight or nine yards inside the boundary, so he was positioned superbly to take this catch. That's the third time Worker has failed to convert a half-century into a big score.
turns this with the spin to deep square
touch short, Latham works this to short midwicket
too full and drifting into middle and leg, eased to long-on
touch short on middle, punched to midwicket
right to the pitch of the ball as he turns this full delivery from off stump to midwicket
too short, cut away towards deep point. Excellent running

did that flick the glove on the way? There was some noise, but umpire calls this wide. Short of length delivery directed towards the body, Latham looks to glance this fine. There was definite noise, but Holder decides against a review after chatting with his mates. Strangely enough, snicko shows nothing
right on top of the bounce of this short ball as he defends.
steers this short of length delivery down to square third man
floats this full on middle, pushed to mid-on as they scamper a quick single
this is a rip roaring bouncer that had Latham ducking for cover, tried to look away as he was on his toes. Whizzed over his helmet
short but way down leg, wide and it's an easy call
turns this length ball gently into the leg side
goes for that typical Taylor slash, but this was on the fuller side and angling in, beaten.
works this indrifter towards short midwicket
punches this length delivery to sweeper cover
defends this incoming delivery into the leg side
worked with the spin to long-on as they jog the single
drifts in from around the stumps, punched to deep point
makes room and cuts to point
steered down to point, hesitation in the running so they decide against the run
gets on top of the bounce and turns this gently into the leg side
top-edges a pull, flies over the outstretched hands of the keeper. Streaky
gentle little forward push to cover
helped all along the ground to deep fine leg
right behind the line of this full delivery as he blocks
drifting into the pads, worked to deep midwicket
turns this full delivery on the pads to midwicket
spins back into middle, defended back, good work by the bowler to stop that on his followthrough
bunts this gently back to the bowler
shapes to pull but this short ball was slipping down leg, good take by the keeper
outstanding stop at point by Kyle Hope, one-handed stop as he dives full length to his right. This was cut nicely by Taylor
turns this with the angle past midwicket
short of length delivery angling away, defended towards the man coming in from point
gets on top of the bounce and turns this gently past square leg
squared up by the length but manages to defend this back down the pitch
driven through the line, down to wide mid-off for a quick single
gets across the stumps and pulls him all along the ground to long leg
turns this full delivery down to long-on
quicker one on middle, defended.
defends this back to the bowler, who dives to his right to stop that
cramped for room, defended this to midwicket
steps out and works this to midwicket. Nurse saw him giving the charge and shortened his length
a sloppy effort from Holder at short midwicket gives away a single, he tries to smartly parry this stop to the bowler
steered wide of point for an easy single
cramped for room as he bunts this behind the keeper
pulled all along the ground to long leg
helped along through the vacant cordon. Banged in short but Taylor did well to get onto his toes and use the pace to hit this into the third man bounday
right behind the line of this incoming length ball as he defends
sublime cover drive, but excellent work by the man at wide mid-off. Tumbling stop
full and angling away, defended towards point
cuts this down to deep point
drifts into middle and off, punched to point
drifts in full on middle, risky little sweep to deep square. Would've been plumb had he missed
turns this to midwicket, calls no immediately
steers this short ball straight to third man
right to the pitch of the ball as he works this down to long-on
punches this length delivery to deep point
drives this length delivery straight to cover
through him. Tried to play this through cover with a horizontal bat, but this beat the inside edge, on the bounce through to the keeper.
wrists this length delivery to square leg
steered uppishly to square third man
bunts this length delivery to point
steps out and whips this full delivery straight to midwicket
steps out to drive, but ends up blocking this as the bowler shortens his length
works this shortish delivery down to long-on
steps out and eases this into the leg side
steps out and bunts this down to long-off
too short, he rocks back to open up the leg side and pulls him all along the ground to deep square leg.
extra bounce does the trick once again! Short on off stump and zips off the surface, takes his glove as it lobs to the keeper. Latham's poor domestic form continues
good length on middle, tapped off the back foot to midwicket
back of a length outside off, Nicholls gets his head out of the ball's way by turning away as it carries through to Hope at head height
sticks to more short stuff outside off, the batsman's happy to bend his knees and drop under the rising delivery
short and wide outside off, mistimed cut to deep point
short and wide outside off, punched past the diving cover fielder and Taylor punishes the loose delivery. Threads the gap between mid off and cover
short on middle, tapped off the back foot to midwicket and there's his fifty. His 39th in ODIs
short on leg stump, and pulled along the ground to fine leg. Safe shot
good length just outside off, too close for a powerful cut but enough room for Taylor to glance this to deep point
good length on middle stump, happy to defend off the front foot. Full face of the bat offered
good length on middle and angling away from his body, cut to point from near his chest. No run this time
on a good length outside off, mistimed cut off the back foot to deep point
back of a length outside off, carved off the back foot to point
short outside off, tiptoes and defends off the back foot
short outside off and dragged towards deep midwicket off the back foot. Spongy bounce and Taylor does well to ensure the ball stays along the carpet
short outside off but angling into his body, pulled with some muscle behind it and there's no stopping that!
what a great catch! Good length just outside off and Taylor chooses to poke at it, takes the outside edge and Shai Hope dives to his right. Taylor goes after another useful fifty
good length and attacking his pads on middle stump, turned off his hips to midwicket
good length just outside off, slower this time slightly. Defended with soft hands as they take off for a quick single
short on off and crunches this pull after swiveling on his toes, but well fielded by the big Holder at midwicket
short on off and angling away from the left-hander, easily cut to the fielder in the deep on the off side
short on middle but angling down leg stump, glanced off his hips to square leg
short on middle and this time the pull is timed very well. Midwicket has no chance on this occasion and neither can deep midwicket intercept this shot. A beautiful sound off the bat
full on off stump, defended towards cover and Astle is quick to call for the run
good length on middle and angling across, punched with the open bat towards cover point. No run this time
good length on middle, defended with soft hands towards point
good length on middle, simply pushed off the back foot to the gap near cover
full just outside off, carefully defended off the front food. Loud call of 'no' from Astle
short outside off, cut off the bat's toe end to third man. They wanted the two, but the fielder in the deep does really well
full on off stump, driven along the carpet to deep cover for just a run
good length on leg stump, pushed off the back foot to mid on
good length on off stump, defended off the front foot with the full face of the bat
back of a length on off stump, mistimed punch off the back foot. The ball trickles away to point, allowing them to run through
full on middle stump and angling into the right-hander's pads, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket. Early call for the double
good length on middle, gets inside the line of the ball and taps it towards midwicket
short on middle and pulled with ease along the ground to deep backward. Big chase for the fielder there

good length on leg stump and Nicholls comes down the ground to defend. Punched straight back to Holder, who does really well to throw at the striker's stumps, but misses by a bit! Nicholls may have been struggling. Good presence of mind from the captain
good length on middle and angling across his body, opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man
good length outside off, a slower delivery this time. Tapped off the back foot to cover point off the back foot. Tiptoes to get on top of that delivery
full on middle and angling across, pushed to mid off
good length just outside off, defended with the bat's open face. Played to cover. Holder ends his spell with 2 for 52
back of a length on off stump, punched off the back foot to mid off. Another easy single for this duo. Allowing them to settle in
back of a length outside off, defended off the back foot to short cover. They want the single, but Holder cuts it off
full on middle and leg, turned off his toes to fine leg. Gets Nicholls back on strike
good length on off stump, opens the bat's face and tries to play this past point but can't find the gap. Straight to the fielder there
full and wide outside off, slashes hard at it as it takes a top edge to third man. In the air but still safe

full and wide outside off, driven extravagantly but takes the outside edge, good effort from third man, who dives to his left and stops the ball from rolling over for a boundary. The umpires will have a look nonetheless
full just outside off on the fourth-stump line. Defended back to Cottrell
back of a length wide outside off, extra room on offer and crunched off the back foot. Deep point has no chance

traps him in front of middle stump! Full ball and he misses the flick. The umpire says he's lbw! Nicholls is reviewing. Pitches on middle, hits him in front of leg. No hotspot on the bat, no snicko edge either. What does ball tracking say? Missing leg stump! Not out!
good length on middle stump, comes inside the line of the ball and punches to mid on
back of a length just outside off, tapped to cover off the back foot
short outside off and cut off the back foot to deep point
sliding into the pads, worked to midwicket
punched to deep point
turned with the angle to square leg
fuller and straighter on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
looks to heave this leg side but toe-ends this to midwicket
fired full but angling down leg, wide called
slips this outside off in anticipation of the batsman giving him the charge, way outside the marker
bunted to deep cover
banged in shot but this is just a touch outside leg, he ducks under it That's one bouncer for the over
hops back and across as he turns this short delivery into the leg side
gets on top of the bounce and dabs this towards the man coming in from point
right into the blockhole, Nicholls squeezes this into the covers for a quick single
turns this length ball on middle to midwicket
works this off his hip to deep midwicket
drifting away from middle, steered to deep point
driven with the spin to cover
slows this down nicely but the angle is on middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket
touch fuller outside off, not much turn, flayed into the gap between deep cover and wide long-off
looks to sweep but got some glove as the ball lobbed up, but the keeper reacted just a little late.
width outside off, slashed into the gap at deep point.
touch fuller and angling away, defends this off a thick inside edge to midwicket
full but slips this down leg, Nicholls looks to help this over square leg but misses. Not sure why that wasn't called wide
picked away off his pads towards deep midwicket
backs away and swats this short of length delivery to the deep extra cover fence
punches this length ball towards deep cover
full and angling in towards middle, dabs this gently into the off side for a quick single
slower length ball outside off, eased to deep extra cover
works this away-going delivery uppishly through midwicket
doesn't get hold of the pull but called for two immediately. Down towards deep midwicket.
floats this length ball way outside off, left alone. Looks like this slipped out
pacy delivery angling in from wide of the crease to deflect off the pad to behind square as he looks to clip it away. Beaten for pace
driven down the ground to long-off
driven straight to mid-off as they scamper the single
full and sliding into the pads, clipped on the bounce to deep backward square leg. The fielder nearly over-ran the ball
slower and fuller on leg stump, flicked into the gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg.
makes room to go over cover, the bowler shortens his length and cramps him for room, worked towards midwicket
heaved into the leg side, down to deep midwicket
very, very clever. Too full on leg stump, he gets down on one knee and uses the pace of the bowler to scoop this over the keeper's head.
makes room and slaps this to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
width outside off, slaps this down to long-off
floats this full and just outside off, steered wide of cover as they scamper a single
swung across the line, not in complete control as he toe-ends this, deep midwicket comes in to stop that
dropped by Shai Hope! This was a tough chance. Slower and fuller outside off, Astle looks to go over cover but gets a thick edge. Looped to the man behind
fired way outside off, left alone. Rightly called wide
top-edges this slog but this one flies over the keeper's head, Cottrell runs back from short third man to pull it back in. Tumbling effort by the big man
muscled and this is hit too well, into the gap at deep midwicket. It didn't matter that he fetched this from way outside off
full on middle and leg, he turns this towards midwicket to get to his 3rd ODI fifty
looks to sway out of the way initially, then tried to upper cut, almost as an afterthought, but misses.
looks to duck, then slash over point but pulled out as he saw this slower delivery spin sway
slashed away but bounced short of Nurse who comes in from square third man.
backs away and slaps this length ball over extra cover. Picked the length early, held his shape and walloped this away
steers this length delivery wide of point
walloped a long way into the crowd at deep midwicket. Just cleared his front leg and swung this length ball into the stands.
brilliant improvisation! Walks across the stumps and sweeps this yorker-length delivery into the deep backward square leg boundary
slower bouncer and he's picked the bones out of this, pulled over deep midwicket. Held his shape for a split-second and then muscled it away. The good thing was he was hitting it with the breeze.
drills this full delivery to the man at the edge of the ring at cover point
backs away and punches this full toss to extra cover

belted down the ground, this is another full toss which he plays straight and beats long-off. Nicholls has picked 21 off that over, very poor from Gabriel. Too predictable, far too inconsistent as well
walks across the stumps and slog sweeps him over deep backward square leg. Excellent pick-up stroke. This was slower, fuller and gave Astle enough time to make the adjustment. What a partnership
swings his full toss to deep midwicket. This was full and angling away from around the stumps
right into the blockhole, squeezed into the leg side.

wow, this is magnificent. This is the highest partnership for NZ against WI for the sixth wicket. This is a half-volley on middle from around the stumps, Astle walked across, got down on one knee and clobbered this over wide long-on
sweeps this full toss on middle to deep square leg
looks to scoop it fine, toe-ends it towards midwicket
slips this length ball way outside off
down on one knee as he flat-bats this length ball down to long-on

end of a super innings, falls one short of a maiden ODI fifty. Very unselfish from Astle, looks to back away and belt this over the bowler's head but missed it completely and heard this length ball clip the top of middle.
short on middle, Bracewell just helps it on its way to the fine leg boundary
squeezes this full delivery on the bounce to the keeper, looked to go over cover, got a thick edge.
mistimes an attempted slog towards the man coming in from deep midwicket, back for the second quite comfortably
will get to his highest ODI score courtesy a misfield at deep point. This was slower and fuller, he backed away and squeezed it towards the man coming in from the deep
full first up, driven firmly back to mid off
full outside off, angles away from Lewis, who chooses to shoulder his arms
on a good length on middle, comes inside the line of the ball and defends off the front foot
goes short this time! Pitches on middle stump but Lewis chooses not to engage. Drops his knees and gets under the ball
good length on off and pulled! Off the top half of the bat and falls just short of the two fielders congregating near midwicket. So close. Full points to Worker for the effort
overpitched full on off middle stump, clipped off his toes with ease and midwicket gives it a futile chase
full just outside off, happy to shoulder his arms. Nice carry through to Latham

dropped! A chance goes down. And it's Worker again. Back of a length outside off and straightened after pitching. Lewis tried to defend but takes the outside edge. Dropped by the diving first-slip fielder
punished next ball! Full on middle and it's lifted beautifully over the bowler's head. Glorious
back of a length on middle and leg, clipped off his pads towards the fine leg but doesn't come off the bat. Takes the thigh-guard instead
back of a length outside off and angling further away from the right hander, left alone by Hope

cuts him in half! There's the break through. Good length on off stump and tailing into the right hander. Zips through between bat and pad and breaks top of off stump. Kyle Hope's torrid run continues. Just about enough gap for the ball to go through
beautifully driven past cover for four more. Pitched up just outside off and he climbs onto that shot in a flash. Off the middle of the bat
back of a length on off stump, punched off the back foot with the square bat. Goes to cover point
good length on middle stump, walks across to the off side to flick off his pads but takes a leading edge towards the bowler
back of a length on off stump, sticks deep to his crease and defends back to Henry
back of a length on leg stump, defended with soft hands towards mid off. Calls early for the single
full on middle, pushed towards the on side and the bowler dives to his right to stop this from going past him
back of a length outside off, swings further away after pitching. Shoulders his arms to this
back of a length outside off, punched well off the back foot, but the infield on the off side is packed

back of a length on off stump, pulled well but not well enough! Straight down fine leg's throat and Boult has his second. It had the elevation, but not the distance, and the dangerous Lewis has to walk back. Crunch wicket
full on leg stump, tapped off his toes to deep midwicket and he's off the mark
overpitched on leg stump, defended with soft hands
back of a length on off stump and whizzes past the outside edge of his bat. Attempted to defend but played the wrong line
back of a length on the fourth-stump line, attempts to defend but off the lower half of his bat. Trickles away
short stuff just outside off stump, Shai Hope drops his knees and gets under the delivery. First bouncer, says umpire Oxenford
back of a length outside off once again, tries to punch at it but mistimed towards short cover
short and wide outside off, flashy cut but gets the desired connection. Finds the gap between cover and point
full just outside off, mistimed defense towards short cover. Henry races towards it and retrieves himself. Commitment
back of a length on off stump, forces the batsman to go back into the crease. Defended
third wicket for Boult! Nagging length outside off and he gets rewarded once again. Hetmyer tries to poke at it with the angled bat and it's another catch at first slip. West Indies in tatters
overpitched full on off stump, swing into the right hander, defended towards midwicket with the bat turning in his hand
good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot. Boult takes a fall in his follow through. Unhurt
good length on off stump and straightens after pitching. Traps him in front of the wicket, as it hits the top of his pad, but height the issue
pushed wide outside off on  good length, shoulders his arms this time. Extra room on offer but the batsman is in no mood to free his arms
back of a length on off stump and straightens after pitching again. Terrific fast bowling here from Boult. Extra bounce after hitting the surface and smacks the batsman near his thighs
overpitched on middle stump, dug away towards midwicket for a quick run. Good throw at the non-striker's but misses the stumps
good length on middle, clipped off his hips to deep midwicket
good length on off stump, turned off his hips once again. Deep midwicket the man in action
good length just outside off, punched off the front foot back to Henry
back of a length wide outside off, angles into the right hander. Blocked off the back foot
wild heave towards the off side but can't make any connection. Full and wide outside off but misses the slog completely. That's the over
back of a length on leg, extra zip off the surface this time. Tiptoes and defends
width offered and cuts this past point, looks like it'll go for four, but third man does extremely well to run around and stop this from hitting the ropes
full outside off, crisp front-foot drive past cover, well timed and cover has to give it a chase
back of a length on middle stump, goes deep into the crease and defended off the back foot
back of a length on off stump, tapped off the back foot to cover point
short on middle and cramps the batsman uncomfortably. Mohammed swats this from near his head and it takes a top edge. Flies over the keeper and that's an unconvincing boundary
back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to the off side and pulls to fine leg
back of a length outside off stump, lets this go past him through to the keeper
full on off stump, driven elegantly past the fielder at cover for another boundary. Perfect timing and played on the up. Can't touch this
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot. Straight to mid off
good length outside off, this time he gets the muscle behind his back-foot punch. Beats the man at cover point
back of a length outside off, played off the back foot to point
more chasing for the fielders to go, played off the back foot past cover point. Threads the gap in front of square
good length on off stump, turned off his hips towards mid on
dispatched to cow corner! Full on off and no lateral movement on offer. Shai Hope plonks his foot in front and slogs this cross-batted
full outside off and this time he brings out the square drive. No one behind point there and that's another boundary. Getting a move on, are we?

it's a skyer! Fourth for Boult. Full on middle and he gives it another wild slog, comes off the bat's toe end and Latham composes himself before diving forward and taking a simple catch. West Indies' hopes slowly fading away
full ball just outside off, squeezed away to cover off the front foot
back of a length just outside off, punched off the back foot to mid off. Tight start from Bracewell
back of a length wide outside off, Holder chooses to tentatively poking at it but can't make any contact. The ball was past him before he even lifted his bat
back of a length on middle stump, muscled off the back foot towards midwicket. Man there
it's wide outside off on a good length, punched well off the back foot but the fielders in the infield are sharp. Diving stop at cover
back of a length on  off stump, turned off his hips past the fielder at midwicket. Gets off strike
good length just outside off stump, worked off his hips to midwicket
crunches this drive between cover and mid-off, for a single
touch fuller, just outside off, defended from the crease
gets on top of the bounce and steers this down to square third man

just short of fine leg. Banged in short, Holder decided to take him on with the pull but fortunately didn't hit it as well as he would've liked. Brave effort from Henry, risked being hit on the face as he went for it
hops back and across as he fends this bouncer on middle
slants this length ball into middle, defended with soft hands
turns this incoming length ball on middle and off to midwicket
short of length outside off, he hops back and steers this straight to point
skiddy bouncer outside off but way over Mohammed's head as he sways away
slides a length ball on middle and leg, worked off his hip to midwicket
backs away to try and force this over cover but is beaten by the late movement off the seam. Bounces over the stumps
pulled nicely into the gap, deep square and fine leg converge to stop that
slower delivery, well-disguised outside off, he was through with the forward push, beaten.
right into the blockhole from wide of the crease, kept out. 147kph first up
shapes to drive but is late on the stroke because of the pace, rolls back to the bowler
gets on top of the bounce and fends this short ball towards the off side
right behind the line of this short of length delivery as he defends
scorching drive. Just a touch too full, he blasted this into the gap at extra cover but the ball just stopped before it crossed the ropes.
dabs this wide of point for an easy single
driven through the line to extra cover
excellent use of his wrists as he whips this length delivery from off stump to deep midwicket. Colin Munro was right on the money as he hared across to prevent the second run
right to the pitch of the ball as he defends this full-length delivery
turns this slower length ball from outside off to deep midwicket
stands tall and punches this length delivery into the off side.
steers this short of length delivery down to square third man
gets into an awkward position as he looks to play a short-arm jab, hit on the shoulder as the ball deflects into the helmet. Pacy stuff.
uppish but this thick edge rolls down to third man

bounced him out and it's a beauty to get him. This is a ripper of a bouncer angled in at his throat from around the stumps, he tries to drop his wrists to get out of the way but it's too late because the ball keeps coming back in to thud into his glove and lob back to the bowler who takes a dolly.
Raw pace, deadly accuracy. Rovman Powell gets a yorker first-up, by the time his bat came down to squeeze that out, the off pole was flat on the ground.
just whizzes past the edge. This was a short of length ball angling in, Nurse played inside the line
just through the hands of the short leg fielder. Nicholls was there, but may have reacted just a tad too late as Nurse hopped back to fend this steep bouncer. Tough, tough chance. Dropped
thick outside edge but this races to the third man boundary. He was drawn forward by the length, Nurse played with an angled bat
tucks this length ball to square leg
this full delivery shapes away a touch from off stump, squirted towards point
just short of Astle at mid-off Nurse went for an ambitious on-the-up drive, hit this on the top part of the bat. Lucky to still be there.
tucks this off his hip towards deep backward square leg
skiddy bouncer which he looks to pull, but is late on the stroke
turns this down towards mid-on for a quick single
looks to belt this down the ground but gets a thick inside edge on this length ball to mid-on
not for the first time today a top-edge has flown over the keeper's head and into the boundary. Lockie overstepped as well, so this will be a free-hit. Genuine pace again
backs away to swing this to Wellington, but can't connect. Looked to hit over mid-on, head looking away, blind swing.
works this length ball off his hip to deep square leg
right on top of the bounce as he steers this short of length delivery into the off side

why on earth would you try pulling a fast bowler who regularly clocks 145kph, especially when the short ball is your weakness? Tries to fetch this from outside off, but he only manages to get a top-edge as Munro runs backwards from midwicket to complete an easy catch.
hops back and watches this short of length delivery zip across as he plays inside the line
full and angling in, worked to midwicket
gloves this attempted pull down to fine leg
uppish but this thick inside edge lands short of mid-on
looks to take on the pull but this ball gets big on him, angle means he's way down leg. Wide called.
gets half a stride in as he defends this full delivery on middle
angles in from length to hit him on the pad as he looks to work this behind square
angles in from wide of the crease to hit him on the flap of the pad as he is caught on the hop.
hops back and across as he turns this short of length delivery to the leg side.
thumps this full delivery behind point, third man comes around to cut that off
right behind the line of this short ball as he defends
whips this full delivery into the gap at midwicket
pulled but this was a flat hit on the bounce to the man coming in from deep square.
drifts in a tossed up delivery on leg stump, worked to midwicket
full toss that has been driven down to long-off
fired into middle and off, defended from the crease
googly this time, Cotterell didn't read this off the hand or the pitch, played outside the line and is beaten. But the angle would've taken it down leg
rocks back and heaves this short delivery into the gap at midwicket, one bounce into the boundary
swung across the line, toe-ends it wide of mid-off where Bracewell puts out a dive to stop it
full outside off, driven back to Boult. Mistimed shot
short on middle stump and pulled along the carpet to deep midwicket

and there's his fifth! Third five-for in ODIs. Short on middle and this time he's cramped. Had walked across to the off side and simply ends up gloving this through to Latham. Extra bounce doing the trick once more
back of a length on middle stump, does well to get his head out of the way
full on middle stump, flicked off his pads to deep midwicket

back of a length on middle and pulled, he's off balanced completely but enough wood behind that swing to take it towards deep midwicket. The batsman did well to stay on his feet after that shot. Looked like he had his dancing shoes on, Nurse
full on middle and leg, worked off his toes beyond short fine leg, chase from the fielder and he pulls it back just inches before the boundary
back of a length just outside off, wrong'un this time, spinning into the batsman. Defended off the back foot
good length outside off once again, defended off the back foot this time as well
full on leg stump, tapped off his toes to deep backward square
back of a length outside off, spins into his body and cuts it late behind point. Racing away after clearing the infield
short outside off and staying low, pulled back to the bowler off the back foot. Off the bat's toe end
full on leg stump, bunted back to Boult. Smartly collected on the fly
short on leg stump and gets big on Beaton. Beaten for pace
short on leg stump and going over the relatively tall batsman's head. Lucky not to be called a wide for line or height
low full toss on off stump, tries to slog at it but comes off the bat's inside edge towards midwicket. Takes one hand off the bat while playing
how did that miss top of off stump?! Good length on off stump and Beaton's beaten for pace once again. Attempts to defend, but does it from top of middle stump. The ball, however, went over off
overpitched full on middle and leg, misses the whip off his pads as the ball smacks him under the knee roll. Loud appeal for lbw but turned down. Would've gone down leg but also took an inside edge
short outside off and attempts to pull. Takes the inside edge and just bounces over the stumps. Lucky. Couldve easily played on
full on middle and angling into the right hander, muscled towards mid on
just short of the keeper! Sharp dip after taking the outside edge, and Latham cannot get down in time. Back of a length outside off and defends off the wrong line. Found the edge nonetheless.
back of a length outside off again, ddefended
good length outside off, gets behind the line of the ball and defends. Beaton looks like he's in pain, taking the right hand off his bat after playing every shot
back of a length on off stump, blocked off the back foot. And that's the halfway point. West Indies still need over 210 runs
back of a length outside off, fended off the front foot. Tame batting now
back of a length wide outside off, drags his pull behind square
back of a length outside off, angling into Beaton's body. Defended
slow yorker on off stump and very well defended by Beaton. Got his bat down in time
back of a length outside off, driven along the ground to mid off
back of a length outside off and tries to cut this square, too close to his body and the ball flies over his blade
full on off stump, turned off his body towards deep backward square
good length on off stump, prods forward and fends off the front foot
back of a length outside off, could've pulled but chooses to pull out of the shot instead
full on off stump and attacking the stumps, tries to defend but extra bounce makes the ball hit the bat-maker's sticker. Really tough for him to keep his top hand on the bat
half volley outside off and given the treatment it deserves! Driven back past the bowler and mid off can't cut it off
back of a length on middle, Beaton happy to get his head out of the way
back of a length on leg stump, gets big on Nurse. Defended once again
back of a length on middle stump, fended off the back foot towards mid off
beautiful yorker on leg stump, Nurse does well to get his bat down and save his toes from being crushed
short on middle and this time Nurse chooses to pull. It's in the air, and taken at deep midwicket. Second six-for for Boult and the fifth fastest bowler to 100 ODI wickets
full outside off and Gabriel misses the drive. Flies past his outside edge

there's the seventh! Breaks off stump and it's all over! Full and straight on off stump. West Indies all out for 121. Second-best bowling figures for New Zealand by Boult. Just misses the 7 for 33 achieved by Tim Southee.
